codelabs.title: Using Intel Realsense SDK
codelabs.summary: We are going to illustrate how to build some Intel Realsense SDK samples on an ubuntu desktop. You will be able to hook up on your Intel Joule and build the samples, explore some of the code and try them!

codelabs.title: Create your first snap
codelabs.summary: We are going to use snapcraft to walk you through the creation of your first snap and main snapcraft concepts.

codelabs.title: Basic snap usage
codelabs.summary: In this codelab, we are going to cover the very basic on how to use snaps on your distributions, and the main benefits from them.

codelabs.title: Build a nodejs service
codelabs.summary: We are going to use the nodejs snapcraft plugin to build a simple service. We'll guide you through the good practice for debugging and iterating over your web server, and basic confinement notions.

codelabs.title: T贸picos Selectos en Aplicaciones Distribuidas M贸viles
codelabs.summary: Ofrecer una vista general del ecosistema de programaci贸n Jupyter Notebooks como punto de partida para desarrollar prototipos de aplicaciones m贸viles basadas en Android

codelabs.title: Setup Intel Joule
codelabs.summary: In this codelab, we are going to setup Ubutu Core on your Intel flash. We'll flash the sd card with an Ubuntu Core image and then configure it.

codelabs.title: Create your own Core image
codelabs.summary: Create your own Ubuntu Core image for a particular model, by assembling snaps available in the store. Make your own device image with some snap preinstalled or additional functionalities!

idf-2016.name: IDF 2016
idf-2016.description: This workshop is taking place at IDF in SF (2016).
